## FeedbackButtons() function

Displays feedback buttons (e.g. thumbs up and thumbs down) that will report analytic events on click.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function FeedbackButtons({ customCssClasses, responseId, }: FeedbackButtonsProps): React.JSX.Element;
```
